main event: On 9 September 1956, a civilian observed a bright circular object in the sky over Big Bethel, Virginia, which displayed several abrupt maneuvers and disappeared after about 20 minutes.
interesting points: The object was initially bright red and approximately the size of a basketball, then flattened and dimmed as it approached,It was reported to change shape and color throughout the sighting, resembling the moon at times,The witness claimed to see a human silhouette inside the object,No other aircraft or objects were present in the vicinity during the sighting,The object was observed within good visibility conditions and the weather reports verified the moon's visibility at the time.
